list/Add.description: Adds an item to a named list

list/Contains.description: Returns true if the list contains the value. (as a value - not a key)

list/Get.description: Returns a copy of the list stored at identifier

list/GetForEdit.description: Returns the actual table of the list stored at identifier. Modifying this will affect the stored list

list/Set.description: Sets a specific position in the named list to a value.
